doc.after: Pilgrimage is not mandatory in Hinduism though many adherents undertake them 203 While there are different yet similar pilgrimage routes in different parts of India all are respected equally well according to the universality of Hinduism The following pilgrimage sites are most famous amongst Hindu devotees
